source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot from a low, water-level perspective inside a white-tiled, arched tunnel. The viewpoint moves slowly through the greenish water. Ahead, the tunnel opens into a larger, brightly lit, and sterile-looking pool area.
